content:
Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for his role in the armed struggle against the apartheid regime in South Africa. He was arrested in 1962 and sentenced to life imprisonment for charges of sabotage and conspiracy to overthrow the government.

Amnesty International is a human rights organization that campaigns to end human rights abuses around the world. It was founded in 1961, around the same time that Mandela was first arrested. Amnesty International took up Mandela's case and campaigned for his release, arguing that he was a political prisoner and that his
